MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Speke Church Road, School Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.17pm. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed there is a fault on the underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:15pm on 20th January 2021
